tweets.text:
EXCLUSIVE: 
With the publication of my book today, I can finally announce: in the course of writing my book, my sources and I believe we uncovered the identity of the Ethereum's 2016 DAO hacker.
Ngl, I actually think it would be fun to be in Portugal and Spain right now with the power out. I missed the big NYC power outage in 2003 and basically missed a gigantic party
